Sihanoukville is booming but it now ‘feels like a Chinese town, not a Cambodian town’, residents complain

https://www.scmp.com/news/asia/southeast-asia/article/3022579/sihanoukville-booming-it-now-feels-chinese-town-not

Wherever there is PRC chinese, people complain about their presence! From first world country like Singapore and Hong Kong to Cambodian! Do they reflect on their own problem?
